Tracking could not start due to missing permissions.
We\â€™re all about movements. We can\'t measure your mobility if your phone doesn\'t know where you are.

This app collects location data to enable you to enjoy insights into your travel behaviour, even when the app is closed or not in use. \nPlease let us know your location all the time.\nYou can turn off tracking anytime in the app settings.
